data.comment: Today's referee, Braulio da Silva Machado, has blown to start the match.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 2, Free kick Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In Santos, Arthur Gomes (Santos) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Gremio at Urbano Caldeira.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 6, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in Santos.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 12, At Urbano Caldeira, Robinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In Santos Santos drive forward through Kaio Jorge. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 14, Gremio have a goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Santos throw-in in Gremio's half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Gremio to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pepe of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 19, Santos have been given a penalty...
Marinho smashes in a penalty at Urbano Caldeira. The score is now 1-0.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Santos.
In the minute 21, Santos's Jobson has been booked in Santos.
Santos needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Santos throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 24, Thaciano (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Santos.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 28, Santos's Para gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Santos advance rapidly upfield but Braulio da Silva Machado blows for offside.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 30, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 32, Diego Souza (Gremio) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Santos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 35, Santos are on the attack at Urbano Caldeira, where Jean Mota is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Santos.
Lucas Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Santos.
In the minute 37, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Santos are whistled for offside.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Gremio's area.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Gremio at Urbano Caldeira.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 42, Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Arthur Gomes, who is grimacing with pain.
Arthur Gomes has recovered and rejoins the match in Santos.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Santos in the half of Gremio.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Santos throw-in in Gremio's half.
Isaque is on a sub for Robinho for Gremio.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 48, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Souza (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 49, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Marinho hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Santos for Santos.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 52, Santos to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Paulo Miranda.
In the minute 54, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) has taken off Paulo Miranda who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Rodrigues is the replacement.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 56, Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Gremio.
Santos push upfield but Braulio da Silva Machado quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Isaque for Gremio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Santos a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Santos.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jobson for Santos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Gremio's David Braz breaks free at Urbano Caldeira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Santos.
In the minute 64, Santos's Jobson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Gremio at Urbano Caldeira.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 66, Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Santos throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Gremio make their third substitution with Maicon replacing Lucas Silva.
The away team have replaced Bruno Cortes with Diogo Barbosa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
In the minute 73, Goal! Diego Souza equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Madson is replacing Jean Mota for the home team.
In the minute 78, Santos have been awarded a penalty...
David Braz is booked for the away team.
Goal! Marinho gives Santos the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
In the minute 81, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Gremio throw-in in Santos's half.
Luiz Fernando is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 82, Luiz Fernando is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Santos to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Madson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 84, In Santos, Lucas Verissimo (Santos) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, At Urbano Caldeira, Gremio are penalized for being offside.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a fifth substitution, with Everton replacing Diego Souza.
The home team replace Felipe Jonatan with Laercio Solda.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 87, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Santos have a goal kick.
Kaio Jorge is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 89, Kaio Jorge (Santos) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Lucas Lourenco.
Gremio's Everton is whistled for offside at Urbano Caldeira.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Santos.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Santos have an attacking throw-in.
Gremio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Gremio a goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Gremio's area.
Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Goal kick for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
At Urbano Caldeira the fourth official shows that 9 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick in a good position for Santos!
The match has come to a close in Santos. The final score is 2-1.
Rodrigues (Gremio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marinho (Santos) gets a yellow card.
David Braz has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
